## Plane.isFrontFacingTo() method

Checks if the plane is facing a given direction

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isFrontFacingTo(direction: Vector3, epsilon: number): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  direction | <code>Vector3</code> | the direction to check if the plane is facing |
|  epsilon | <code>number</code> | value the dot product is compared against (returns true if dot &amp;lt;= epsilon) |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`

True is the vector "direction" is the same side than the plane normal.
